overview: Part angel. Part devil. ALL VILLAIN. Katrina Jade is a sexy siren with a glint in her eye and filth on her mind. Ready for a glimpse into the soul of a sinner? Katrina's diabolical fantasies come to life as she journeys through an incredible series of hardcore adventures, including her first anal scene, a dark and daring all-girl threesome, a trasgender tryst and more.
title: Villain
